text: A good reputation is more valuable than money.
author: Publilius Syrus

text: Friendship is like money, easier made than kept.
author: Samuel Butler

text: If saving money is wrong, I don't want to be right!
author: William Shatner

text: Money is a strange business. People who haven't got it aim it strongly. People who have are full of troubles.
author: Ayrton Senna

text: Liking money like I like it, is nothing less than mysticism. Money is a glory.
author: Salvador Dali
